ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"فَأَوْجَسَ","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67289,"word_number_in_surah":125,"word_translation":"Then he felt","word_transliteration":"fa-awjasa"},{"word_arabic":"مِنْهُمْ","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":67290,"word_number_in_surah":126,"word_translation":"from them","word_transliteration":"min'hum"},{"word_arabic":"خِيفَةً","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":67291,"word_number_in_surah":127,"word_translation":"a fear","word_transliteration":"khifatan"},{"word_arabic":"قَالُوا","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":67292,"word_number_in_surah":128,"word_translation":"They said","word_transliteration":"qalu"},{"word_arabic":"لَا","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":67293,"word_number_in_surah":129,"word_translation":"(Do) not","word_transliteration":"la"},{"word_arabic":"تَخَفْ","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":67294,"word_number_in_surah":130,"word_translation":"fear","word_transliteration":"takhaf"},{"word_arabic":"وَبَشَّرُوهُ","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":67295,"word_number_in_surah":131,"word_translation":"and they gave him glad tidings","word_transliteration":"wabasharuhu"},{"word_arabic":"بِغُلَامٍ","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":67296,"word_number_in_surah":132,"word_translation":"of a son","word_transliteration":"bighulamin"},{"word_arabic":"عَلِيمٍ","word_ayah":28,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":67297,"word_number_in_surah":133,"word_translation":"learned","word_transliteration":"alimin"}]

[{"word_arabic":"أَتَوَاصَوْا","word_ayah":53,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67471,"word_number_in_surah":307,"word_translation":"Have they transmitted it to them","word_transliteration":"atawasaw"},{"word_arabic":"بِهِ","word_ayah":53,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":67472,"word_number_in_surah":308,"word_translation":"Have they transmitted it to them","word_transliteration":"bihi"},{"word_arabic":"بَلْ","word_ayah":53,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":67473,"word_number_in_surah":309,"word_translation":"Nay","word_transliteration":"bal"},{"word_arabic":"هُمْ","word_ayah":53,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":67474,"word_number_in_surah":310,"word_translation":"they","word_transliteration":"hum"},{"word_arabic":"قَوْمٌ","word_ayah":53,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":67475,"word_number_in_surah":311,"word_translation":"(are) a people","word_transliteration":"qawmun"},{"word_arabic":"طَاغُونَ","word_ayah":53,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":67476,"word_number_in_surah":312,"word_translation":"transgressing","word_transliteration":"taghuna"}]

[{"word_arabic":"فَإِنَّ","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":67509,"word_number_in_surah":345,"word_translation":"So indeed","word_transliteration":"fa-inna"},{"word_arabic":"لِلَّذِينَ","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":67510,"word_number_in_surah":346,"word_translation":"for those who","word_transliteration":"lilladhina"},{"word_arabic":"ظَلَمُوا","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":67511,"word_number_in_surah":347,"word_translation":"do wrong","word_transliteration":"zalamu"},{"word_arabic":"ذَنُوبًا","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":67512,"word_number_in_surah":348,"word_translation":"(is) a portion","word_transliteration":"dhanuban"},{"word_arabic":"مِّثْلَ","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":67513,"word_number_in_surah":349,"word_translation":"like","word_transliteration":"mith'la"},{"word_arabic":"ذَنُوبِ","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":67514,"word_number_in_surah":350,"word_translation":"(the) portion","word_transliteration":"dhanubi"},{"word_arabic":"أَصْحَابِهِمْ","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":67515,"word_number_in_surah":351,"word_translation":"(of) their companions","word_transliteration":"ashabihim"},{"word_arabic":"فَلَا","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":67516,"word_number_in_surah":352,"word_translation":"so let them not","word_transliteration":"fala"},{"word_arabic":"يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ","word_ayah":59,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":67517,"word_number_in_surah":353,"word_translation":"ask Me to hasten","word_transliteration":"yasta'jiluni"}]
